item.description:
The theme for this group is promoting your local business using the latest and greatest tools the Internet has to offer, and there is a lot of ground to cover. The tools at your disposal are inexpensive (or free) and in the long run, far more effective then advertising outlets traditionally available to local small businesses. The problem is, very few know what, where and why? We can change that.

The agenda:
- introductions
- your goals, needs and expectations
- what tools are out there, and how they can help
- what has changed with the Web, and why is that good for your business
- alignment for the next group meeting
- homework (the sooner you start using these tools, the sooner you'll start benefiting)
item.how_to_find_us: It should be easy - we are in the "Watertown Savings Bank" room
item.name: Greater Boston Area - Promoting your local business on the Internet
